name: Low Poly Lap Racer
description:
LOW POLY LAP Racer

A red Mustang, a windy track and endless rounds to count. In Low Poly Lap Racer you try to drive the fastest round ever. 

Background Info:

This is an unfinished fun project. It’s not a full game with dozens of content. It’s just one track, one car and a lap counter. However, it can be challenging and fun to give yourself some rounds and beat your best time.

I modeled all the props in the game, including the car, house, nature and the track. And finally threw in some code to make it playable. I basically wanted to learn blender again and played around with my 3D models in Unity. 

How to play:

- Xbox Controller: joystick, A and X for driving, Start button for restarting the game

- Keyboard: arrow keys for driving, „r“ key for restarting the game

That’s all to know. Have fun.
